en-IN.summary: Learn Patty Vaithiyam to get more informational tips
examplePhrases: Alexa ask patty Vaithiyam home remedy for dry cough
en-IN.name: Patty Vaithiyam
en-IN.description:
Ask for Patty Vaithiyam, and learn about what really matters, to keep informational. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. 

Patty Vaithiyam helps providing whole family guaranteed tips to be stronger.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Patty Vaithiyam" or "Alexa, open Patty Vaithiyam".

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
